name: Robo Push Pole
description:
THE GAME

Help Robo get Rabbit to the Carrot at the End.

Use your Push Pole to move Hazards out of the way of Rabbit or to move Rabbit away from the Hazards.

NOTES

This is my first game published and my first time entering a game jam.

This game was made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020

TOOLS USED

Game Engine - Unity

Art - https://kenney.itch.io/ 

Sound - SFXR & BFXR
